channel.title: Blue Ant Media on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Blue Ant Media on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Blue Ant Media to Go Public After Completing Reverse Takeover
item.description: Michael McMillan’s production banner will start trading on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol ‘BAMI’ by August 7.
